page.title: 05HOUSING IN DIPTON.
page.content: MY HOUSE by ANTHONY HARTAS. {I live in a detached,stone house which {was built in 1903 for a Colliery Boss. {It is situated in one third of an {acre.There are 5 bedrooms & 9 other {main rooms,plus a huge cellar,& 3 {rooms in the attic.This is where the {servants used to sleep years ago.The {windows are double-glazed & we have {Gas Central Heating.We have a detaced {double garage,and a stone wall around {our garden.There are 2 adults and 4 {children living in our house. MY HOUSE by MICHELLE MILBURN. I live in a stone ,terraced bungalow, which was built in 1912.It has 2 bed rooms,a sitting room,a kitchen,and a bathroom.We have a small garden at the front of the house and a concrete yard at the back.Our garage is at the back of our street.There are 2 adults and 4 children living in our house.
